con:testCase.name: Update Payment
con:testCase.con:description: Update Online PM payment for Non-crossBorder which cannot validate KYC

con:config.con:query: select * from RISK.RISK_CUSTOMER_COUNTRY where length(CUSTOMERID)='11' and COUNTRY_CODE='NO' and ROWNUM=1

select A.CUSTOMERID,A.ACCOUNTNUMBER,A.CUSTOMERTYPE,A.CUSTBANKID,A.CURRENCY from V_AUTHORISATION A where A.ROLETYPE = 'EIER'and CUSTOMERTYPE='P' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_Fetch Customer#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]} and A.ACCOUNTNUMBER IN (SELECT ACCOUNTNUMBER FROM V_AUTHORISATION where ROLETYPE = 'DISP' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_Fetch Customer#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]} ) fetch first 1 rows only

con:config.script:
def customerid = context.expand( '${RBS_Fetch Customer#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]}' ) def debitAccount = context.expand( '${Fetch Account#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNTNUMBER[1]}' ) def debitAcntccy = context.expand( '${Fetch Account#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CURRENCY[1]}' )
customerid= customerid.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","") debitAccount= debitAccount.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","") debitAcntccy= debitAcntccy.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","")
testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("customerid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("userid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("value2",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("agreementid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("debitAccount",debitAccount) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("debitAcntccy",debitAcntccy)

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22">\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentCreateRequest xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn:paymentMessage>\r <urn1:paymentIdentification xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn2:messageIdentification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification>\r <urn2:endToEndIdentification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>\r </urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn1:paymentInfo xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn3:paymentMethod xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">TRF</urn3:paymentMethod>\r <urn2:paymentTypeInformation xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">\r <urn2:instructionPriority>NORM</urn2:instructionPriority>\r </urn2:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:requestedExecutionDate xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">${Properties#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate>\r <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">\r <urn2:identification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#debitAcntccy}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn4:amount xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="USD" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:amount>10</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditorAgent xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:postalAddress xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn4:creditor xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:name xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">USCred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>asdfasdfs</urn2:addressLine>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:identification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r </urn1:transaction>\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Update payment
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentUpdateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:transactionId>${PaymentCreate#Response#//*:PaymentCreateResponse//*:paymentResult//*:transactionId}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn2:paymentMethod>TRF</urn2:paymentMethod> <urn2:paymentTypeInformation> <urn2:instructionPriority>NORM</urn2:instructionPriority> </urn2:paymentTypeInformation> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:requestedExecutionDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(1).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn2:requestedExecutionDate> <urn2:debtorAccount> <urn3:identification>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn3:identification> <urn3:currency>${Properties#debitAcntccy}</urn3:currency> </urn2:debtorAccount> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <urn3:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn3:amount>20</urn3:amount> </urn3:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn3:bic>${Properties#intCredAgentBic}</urn3:bic> <urn3:name>Bondela</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress> <urn3:addressType>ADDR</urn3:addressType> <urn3:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn3:name>creditor</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress> <urn3:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn3:identification>${Properties#intCreditAccount}</urn3:identification> </urn4:creditorAccount> </urn1:transaction> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: PaymentConfirm_updatepayment
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22"> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0"> <urn:transactionInput> <urn1:transactionId xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0">${Update payment#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentUpdateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
